text: Soni mwalekani aŵala ŵaajitesile dini jao kuŵa masanje ni chanache, ni wanyenjile umi wa duniya. Nambo mwakumbusyani najo (Qur’aniji kuti akalamuche), utakuja kupelechedwa ntima (wa mundu jwalijose) ku chonasiko ligongo lya yawapanganyisye, uli nganiukola nkuugosa namuno nkuujokola jwangaŵaga Allah, soni nantimuno chiulinjilile kupeleka chaaliombolela chantundu uliose ngasichipocheledwa kuumila kukwakwe, ŵanganyao ni aŵala ŵapelechedwe ku chonasiko ligongo lya yaŵapanganyisye, akwete kupata yakumwa yamesi gamasemule kwisa soni ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope ligongo lya yaukafili yaŵaliji nkutenda
